long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convenient to record what you are going to do.
Create tasks: Users can create new tasks, including the title of the task
Cancel tasks: Users can delete tasks that are no longer needed or have been completed.
Completing a completed task: Users can mark the task as completed and can restart the task by opening it again.
